recipes.ingredient: 200g spaghetti;100g pancetta;2 large eggs;50g Pecorino cheese;50g Parmesan cheese;black pepper
recipes.process: 1. Boil the spaghetti until al dente;2. Cook pancetta until crispy;3. Beat eggs, add cheese and pepper;4. Mix pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
1. Toss lettuce with dressing;2. Add croutons and cheese;3. Mix well.

recipes.ingredient: Pizza dough;tomato sauce;fresh mozzarella cheese;basil leaves;olive oil
recipes.process: 1. Roll out pizza dough;2. Spread tomato sauce;3. Add cheese and basil;4. Bake until golden.

recipes.ingredient: White rum;fresh lime juice;mint leaves;sugar;soda water;ice
recipes.process: 1. Muddle mint and sugar;2. Add lime juice and rum;3. Top with soda and ice;4. Stir and garnish with mint.
